Search NPI Database by Taxonomy

Source: R/search_by_taxonomy.R
search_by_taxonomy.Rd

This function searches the NPI Database for healthcare providers based on a taxonomy description.

Usage

search_by_taxonomy(
  taxonomy_to_search,
  write_snapshot = TRUE,
  snapshot_dir = NULL,
  notify = TRUE
)

Arguments

taxonomy_to_search

A character vector containing the taxonomy description(s) to search for.

write_snapshot

Logical. If TRUE, the retrieved data is saved as an .rds file for later reference. Defaults to TRUE.

snapshot_dir

Directory where snapshot files should be written when write_snapshot is TRUE. Defaults to a session-specific folder inside tempdir() when not supplied.

notify

Logical. If TRUE, play a notification sound when processing completes (requires the optional beepr package). Defaults to TRUE.

Value

A data frame with filtered NPI data based on the specified taxonomy description.

See also

Other npi: retrieve_clinician_data(), search_and_process_npi()

Examples

# Example usage with multiple taxonomy descriptions:
go_data <- search_by_taxonomy("Gynecologic Oncology")
#> Searching taxonomy 'Gynecologic Oncology' (1 of 1)...
#> 1200 records requested
#> Requesting records 0-200...
#> Requesting records 200-400...
#> Requesting records 400-600...
#> Requesting records 600-800...
#> Requesting records 800-1000...
#> Requesting records 1000-1200...
#> Warning: Unknown or uninitialised column: `error`.
#> Retrieved 868 record(s) for taxonomy 'Gynecologic Oncology'.
fpmrs_data <- search_by_taxonomy("Female Pelvic Medicine and Reconstructive Surgery")
#> Searching taxonomy 'Female Pelvic Medicine and Reconstructive Surgery' (1 of 1)...
#> 1200 records requested
#> Requesting records 0-200...
#> Attempt 1/3 for taxonomy 'Female Pelvic Medicine and Reconstructive Surgery' failed due to 
#> Field: taxonomy_description
#> No taxonomy codes found with entered description. Retrying in 1.0 seconds...
#> 1200 records requested
#> Requesting records 0-200...
#> Attempt 2/3 for taxonomy 'Female Pelvic Medicine and Reconstructive Surgery' failed due to 
#> Field: taxonomy_description
#> No taxonomy codes found with entered description. Retrying in 2.0 seconds...
#> 1200 records requested
#> Requesting records 0-200...
#> Attempt 3/3 for taxonomy 'Female Pelvic Medicine and Reconstructive Surgery' failed due to 
#> Field: taxonomy_description
#> No taxonomy codes found with entered description. Giving up.
rei_data <- search_by_taxonomy("Reproductive Endocrinology")
#> Searching taxonomy 'Reproductive Endocrinology' (1 of 1)...
#> 1200 records requested
#> Requesting records 0-200...
#> Requesting records 200-400...
#> Requesting records 400-600...
#> Requesting records 600-800...
#> Requesting records 800-1000...
#> Requesting records 1000-1200...
#> Warning: Unknown or uninitialised column: `error`.
#> Retrieved 881 record(s) for taxonomy 'Reproductive Endocrinology'.
mfm_data <- search_by_taxonomy("Maternal & Fetal Medicine")
#> Searching taxonomy 'Maternal & Fetal Medicine' (1 of 1)...
#> 1200 records requested
#> Requesting records 0-200...
#> Requesting records 200-400...
#> Requesting records 400-600...
#> Requesting records 600-800...
#> Requesting records 800-1000...
#> Requesting records 1000-1200...
#> Warning: Unknown or uninitialised column: `error`.
#> Retrieved 818 record(s) for taxonomy 'Maternal & Fetal Medicine'.
